summary: The best argument as to why i should NOT be aloud to use CK..
descriptionHtml:
THE FISTS OF A BEAR HATING GOD WHO FOR IRONY COMBINED THE POWER OF MILLIONS OF BEARS TO KILL MILLIONS MORE. 

This is my first mod so sorry if it does something its not supposed to. 

WARNING: THIS EDITS THE STRENGTH OF THE UNARMED ENCH BASE SO IT MAY CAUSE THAT TO BE REMOVED ENTIRELY (Means R.I.P balanced ench) 

How to make? Need steel smithing and 1 gold.

This mod adds a pair of gauntlets to the game that makes you mike tyson spliced with a cave bear. (ALOT of unarmed dmg) 

How to download: Download then place the file in your data file (located normally at: Program Files (x86)/Steam/Steamapps/Common/Skyrim/Data
author: Sir Yolo
